artist: Painter: After Peter Paul Rubens; Delineator: Jean Baptiste Mauzaisse; Lithographer: François Seraphin Delpech
description: bust facing right and looking at viewer wearing cloak with lace collar and chain; large flat brim hat; after a self-portrait
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscription 

in image in black:  Mauzaisse f. / 1822  I lith. de Delpech | on sheet in pencil: Rubens / 2-330
title: Portrait of Peter Paul Rubens
